item.title: 芝加哥市长提出恢复对公司征税以筹集资金
item.description: 芝加哥市长布兰登-约翰逊（Brandon Johnson）正在考虑恢复对企业征税，以帮助增加收入和平衡城市预算。【原文：Chicago Mayor Brandon Johnson is considering reviving a tax on corporations to help raise revenue and balance the city’s budget.】

item.title: CFPB 告诉法官计划重新修订消费者数据权利规则
item.description: 在摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：The US Consumer Financial Protection Bureau is having second thoughts about asking a federal judge to eliminate a Biden-era open-banking rule after proposed data access fees from JPMorgan Chase & Co. drew the ire of several Trump administration allies, including one of the president’s sons.】

item.title: 前千年交易员巴克利推出以能源为重点的对冲基金
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，千禧管理有限责任公司（Millennium Management LLC）的一位前高级投资组合经理在纽荷兰资本（New Holland Capital）的支持下成立了一家以能源为重点的对冲基金。【原文：A former Millennium Management LLC senior portfolio manager has launched an energy-focused hedge fund with the backing of New Holland Capital, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 美国环保局公布废除美国温室气体管制权的计划
item.description: 特朗普政府正式提议取消美国政府将温室气体作为空气污染物进行监管的权力，此举将严重削弱华盛顿应对气候变化的能力。【原文：The Trump administration is formally proposing to scrap the US government’s authority to regulate greenhouse gases as an air pollutant, a move that sets the stage to severely weaken Washington’s ability to fight climate change.】

item.title: EToro 将在以太坊网络上代币化美国股票，进行全天候交易
item.description: eToro Group Ltd. 计划推出美国上市股票的代币化版本，使客户能够在一天中的任何时间进行股票交易。虽然该公司拒绝说明何时开始发售，但表示很可能会在欧洲开始发售。【原文：eToro Group Ltd. plans to launch tokenized versions of US-listed stocks, enabling customers to trade equities at any time of day. Though the company declined to specify when the offering would begin, it said it would likely start in Europe.】

item.title: AllianceBernstein 将把债券和小额互惠基金转换为新的 ETF
item.description: AllianceBernstein LP 计划将其三只固定收益共同基金转换为交易所交易基金，这表明成本较低的投资产品越来越受欢迎。【原文：AllianceBernstein LP plans to convert three of its fixed-income mutual funds into exchange-traded funds, underscoring the growing popularity of the lower-cost investment product.】

item.title: 苹果在一个月内失去第四位人工智能研究员，转投 Meta 的超级智能团队
item.description: 苹果公司在一个月内失去了第四位人工智能研究员，Meta Platforms Inc.【原文：Apple Inc. has lost its fourth AI researcher in a month to Meta Platforms Inc., marking the latest setback to the iPhone maker’s artificial intelligence efforts.】

item.title: 花旗集团聘请摩根大通资深人士 Pankaj Goel 共同领导技术部门
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc）在旧金山聘请了摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：Citigroup Inc. has hired longtime JPMorgan Chase & Co. technology investment banker Pankaj Goel in San Francisco.】

item.title: 纳斯达克北欧市场因技术故障取消部分交易
item.description: 由于平台出现 "技术故障"，纳斯达克北欧分部周二取消了现金股票、交易所交易产品和股票衍生品的交易。【原文：Nasdaq Nordic canceled trades in cash equities, exchange traded products and equity derivatives on Tuesday following a “technical disturbance” on the platform.】

item.title: 美国和中国同意继续就延长关税休战进行谈判
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）表示，美国和中国将继续讨论延长关税休战的条款，唐纳德-特朗普总统将做出最终决定。【原文：The US and China will continue discussing the terms of a tariff truce extension, Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said, and President Donald Trump will make the final call.】

item.title: SoFi 首席执行官吹捧其 "成绩优异 "客户的信贷质量
item.description: SoFi Technologies Inc.首席执行官安东尼-诺托（Anthony Noto）表示，使用银行和投资服务等产品的美国消费者正继续显示出信用增强的迹象。【原文：SoFi Technologies Inc. Chief Executive Officer Anthony Noto said US consumers using products such as banking and investing services are continuing to show signs of credit strength.】

item.title: Anthropic 接近达成融资协议，估值达 1700 亿美元
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，Anthropic 公司即将达成一项协议，在新一轮融资中筹集多达 50 亿美元的资金，这将使这家人工智能初创公司的估值达到 1,700 亿美元。【原文：Anthropic is nearing a deal to raise as much as $5 billion in a new round of funding that would value the artificial intelligence startup at $170 billion, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 投资者关注债务再融资，长期国债大幅上涨
item.description: 在发债计划公布之前，国债在 30 年期国债的带动下反弹，发债计划很可能为美国政府计划如何抑制长期债务收益率提供迹象。【原文：Treasuries rallied, led by 30-year bonds, ahead of the release of the debt-issuance plans that are likely to provide signs for how the US government plans to keep a lid on yields for long-dated debt.】

item.title: 阿布扎比 G42 公司接近与北方数据公司达成人工智能计算交易
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，随着阿布扎比国家支持的人工智能公司在欧洲的扩张，Northern Data AG 公司即将达成一项协议，为阿布扎比的 G42 公司提供数据中心容量。【原文：Northern Data AG is nearing a deal to provide data center capacity for Abu Dhabi’s G42 as the state-backed artificial intelligence company expands in Europe, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 对冲基金 Tyrus 关闭伦敦办事处迁往阿布扎比
item.description: Tony Chedraoui 的对冲基金 Tyrus Capital 正在关闭伦敦的业务，并迁往阿布扎比。【原文：Tony Chedraoui’s hedge fund Tyrus Capital is in the process of shutting down operations in London and relocating to Abu Dhabi.】

item.title: 诺和诺德公司接手重振欧洲减肥巨星的工作
item.description: 迈克-杜斯塔尔（Maziar Mike Doustdar）在诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）默默工作了三十多年，从办公室文员到后勤和营销职位，再到国际业务主管。现在，这位相对默默无闻的内部人士正带着一项艰巨的任务走向聚光灯下：重振这家曾经高歌猛进的制药商，因为在过去一年中，这家制药商的价值锐减了三分之二。【原文：Maziar Mike Doustdar spent more than three decades quietly climbing the ranks of Novo Nordisk A/S, from office clerk through logistics and marketing roles to head of international operations. Now the relatively unknown insider is moving into the spotlight with a daunting task: revive a once high-flying drugmaker from a steep descent that’s wiped out two-thirds of its value in the past year.】

item.title: 尽管欧盟大力推动，俄罗斯石油折扣仍创下开战以来最低水平
item.description: 自 2022 年克里姆林宫发动对乌克兰的战争以来，俄罗斯旗舰产品乌拉尔原油的交易价格相对于基准价格的贴水幅度最小，这表明新的欧洲制裁迄今未能产生影响。【原文：Russia’s flagship Urals crude is trading at its narrowest discount relative to benchmark prices since the Kremlin started its war against Ukraine in 2022, suggesting that fresh European sanctions have so far failed to make an impact.】

item.title: 最后期限临近，南非等待美国对贸易协议的反馈意见
item.description: 南非正在等待美国总统唐纳德-特朗普政府对其贸易建议做出回应，并且无法确保在 8 月 1 日前达成协议，避免对其进口商品征收 30% 的关税。【原文：South Africa is awaiting a response to its trade proposals from US President Donald Trump’s administration and isn’t assured of reaching a deal by Aug. 1 that would avoid 30% tariffs being imposed on its imports.】

item.description:

item.title: 路易斯-斯图尔伯格计划出售使其成为巴西偶像的对冲基金
item.description: 路易斯-斯图尔伯格（Luis Stuhlberger）正在洽谈出售他近三十年前发起的对冲基金，该基金使他成为巴西金融界最受尊敬的人物之一。【原文：Luis Stuhlberger is in talks to sell the hedge fund he launched nearly three decades ago that made him one of the most revered names in Brazil finance circles.】

item.title: 交易商以 1000 亿美元的工业交易额创下夏季新高
item.description: 交易商们一扫对贸易战和地缘政治挥之不去的担忧，带着数十亿美元的并购交易进入传统平静的夏季。【原文：Dealmakers are brushing off lingering fears about trade wars and geopolitics, instead barreling into the traditionally quiet summer months with billions of dollars in M&A.】

item.title: 尽管需求疲软，印度国营电力巨头仍实现利润增长
item.description: NTPC Ltd. 第一季度利润同比增长 6%，原因是发电量的增加帮助印度最大的电力生产商抵消了电力需求的疲软。【原文：NTPC Ltd. reported a 6% rise in first-quarter profit from a year earlier, as an increase in generation capacity helped India’s largest power producer offset muted electricity demand.】

item.title: 基金经理认为诺和诺德之于礼来就像路易威登之于爱马仕
item.description: 诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）与其主要竞争对手礼来公司（Eli Lilly & Co）的股价表现之间的差距不断扩大，令人将其与世界上最大的两家奢侈品制造商相提并论。【原文：A widening gulf between the stock performances of Novo Nordisk A/S and its main competitor Eli Lilly & Co has drawn comparison with two of the world’s largest luxury-goods makers.】

item.title: Figma 12 亿美元首次公开募股超额认购近 40 倍
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Figma 公司在美国的首次公开募股超额认购已接近 40 倍，这家设计与协作软件公司将迎来今年最炙手可热的上市。【原文：Figma Inc.’s US initial public offering is approaching 40 times oversubscribed, according to people familiar with the matter, as the design and collaboration software company heads for what could be the year’s most in-demand listing.】

item.title: 加航美国收入下降，但保持盈利预期
item.description: 尽管前往美国的旅客人数急剧下降，但加航仍保持了稳定的利润指导，并打赌可以在其他国际和国内航线上弥补这一损失。【原文：Air Canada held its profit guidance steady despite a sharp decline in travel to US destinations, betting it can make up for it on other international and domestic routes.】

item.title: 乌干达证券交易所计划在首次公开募股前充实资本金
item.description: 乌干达证券交易所计划明年出售中期票据，以便在拟议的股票出售之前增加资本。【原文：Uganda Securities Exchange plans to sell medium-term notes next year to bolster its capital before a proposed share sale.】

item.title: 美国消费者信心因经济和就业市场前景而上升
item.description: 由于对整体经济和劳动力市场前景的担忧有所缓解，7 月份美国消费者信心指数有所上升。【原文：US consumer confidence increased in July as concerns eased about the outlook for the broader economy and the labor market.】

item.title: 贝克休斯签署 2025 年最大一笔图表购买过桥贷款协议
item.description: 贝克休斯公司（Baker Hughes Co. ）以 96 亿美元收购 Chart Industries Inc.【原文：Baker Hughes Co. has lined up the biggest blue-chip debt financing for an acquisition this year after cinching a $9.6 billion deal to buy Chart Industries Inc.】

item.title: 美国职位空缺在连续跃升后降至 744 万个
item.description: 美国 6 月份的职位空缺在前两个月逐月上升后有所下降，但总体水平在过去一年中保持在一个稳定的范围内，这表明对工人的需求总体上保持稳定。【原文：US job openings fell in June after jumping in each of the prior two months, keeping the overall level in a consistent range over the past year that indicates generally stable demand for workers.】
